metadata.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT model
metadata.Extended description: Strategy for the calculation of soil temperature with the SWAT method. Reference: Neitsch, S.L.; Arnold, J.G.; Kiniry, J.R.; Williams, J.R.; King, K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool. Theoretical Documentation, Version 2000. http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf
metadata.Short description: Computes soil temperature by layers using the SWAT method with a lag coefficient.
